snippet: In a new book, the photographer Anne Deniau compiled 400 images that give a sense of what Alexander McQueen’s life was like behind the scenes.
abstract: Photographer Anne Deniau compiles 400 images that give a sense of what fashion designer Alexander McQueen’s life was like behind the scenes for book Love Looks Not With the Eyes: Thirteen Years With Lee Alexander McQueen.
lead_paragraph: In a new book, the photographer Anne Deniau compiled 400 images that give a sense of what Alexander McQueen’s life was like behind the scenes.

headline.main: McQueen Backstage, in Front of the Lens
headline.print_headline: McQueen Backstage, in Front of the Lens
